description:
When a hot, young and meek urbanite, Jennifer White, needs a little extra cash she rents out her spare bedroom to Tommy Smith. But when Mr. Smith's mysterious late night power tool sessions and his increasingly aggressive attitude reach a tipping point, Miss White is pulled into the nightmare of Tommy's latest creation - a demonic sexual torment device constructed specially for Miss White.
This update includes sexual role play games, hardcore anal sex, tight bondage, deep wet ball gags and features the expert use of the Demonic Sexual Torment Device!
title: Air BnD Nightmare!
